column2:
Easier more accessible way to add events! Type in text / numbers for the various fields. Can export directly into Godot project.
Event Description is the main text displayed. Each Choice text should be kept relatively short. 
Each Metric event is represented. Can be positive or negative.
Instead of using Commas please use semi-colons";"!

My friends want me to come on vacation with them
